vision: To empower Mustafa with a comprehensive understanding of embedded systems design principles and SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture, enabling him to contribute effectively to related projects and innovations.

mentoring_goals.name: Embedded Systems Design Principles
mentoring_goals.objective: Gain a comprehensive understanding of embedded systems design principles.

activities.name: Review foundational literature on embedded systems design.
activities.performance_metrics: Summarize and present key concepts from the literature.

activities.name: Hands-on project to design a simple embedded system.
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully design and demonstrate a functional embedded system.

activities.name: Regular discussions and Q&A sessions.
activities.performance_metrics: Actively participate and clarify doubts in each session.

mentoring_goals.name: SatNav/GNSS SDR Architecture
mentoring_goals.objective: Acquire in-depth knowledge of SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture.

activities.name: Introduction to SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture concepts.
activities.performance_metrics: Summarize and present key concepts related to SatNav/GNSS SDR architecture.

activities.name: Analyze existing SatNav/GNSS SDR systems.
activities.performance_metrics: Present a detailed analysis of at least two existing SatNav/GNSS SDR systems.

activities.name: Design a basic SatNav/GNSS SDR module.
activities.performance_metrics: Successfully design and demonstrate a functional SatNav/GNSS SDR module.

mentoring_goals.name: Application and Real-world Scenarios
mentoring_goals.objective: Apply the acquired knowledge in real-world projects and scenarios.

activities.name: Work on a real-world project involving embedded systems.
activities.performance_metrics: Contribute significantly and demonstrate the application of learned concepts in the project.

activities.name: Attend seminars or workshops on advanced embedded systems topics.
activities.performance_metrics: Present key takeaways from the attended seminars or workshops.

activities.name: Regular feedback and review sessions.
activities.performance_metrics: Actively engage in feedback sessions and demonstrate continuous improvement.
